<!--Code site -->
var codeSite = ''; var identifiantConnexion = ''; var libelleLongFonctionCourante = "";
var pew1ModalMode = true; </script>

<head>

var pew1ModalMode = true; </script> </head>

PROPERTIES.name: password

PROPERTIES.innerHTML: Se connecter
PROPERTIES.outerHTML: <button type="submit" class="btn btn-block cgd-btn-green" id="loginBtn">Se connecter</button>

<script>
	       	// Enable 1st level validation
	       	form.novalidate = false;
	       	
	       	var login = {
	       			
	       		init: function() {
	       			
	       			// Init site
	    	    	$('#siteLabel').text($('#site').val());
	       			
	    	    	$('li>a[data-site]').click(function() {
	    	       		var site = $(this).text();
	    	       		$('#site').val(site);
	    	       		$('#siteLabel').text(site);
	    	       	});
	    	       	
	    	       	// No value ? select the first one
	    	       	if ($('#site').val() === '') {
	    		       	$('li>a[data-site]:first').click();
	    	       	}
	       		}
	       	}
	       	
	       	$(function() {
	       		login.init();
	       	});
	       	
	    </script>
